name: Zombies from the Graven
description:
If a zombie escapes, you lose! 

Hit them when they come out to return them to their graves, and if one starts to escape, take it out before it's too late!

Enjoy 3 intense minutes of a game inspired by the famous "Whac-A-Mole", but with zombies and in 3D! If only one escapes, you lose!

Game developed in 4 days for the "Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Gam"!

Game by LimonSalmon, Thanshuny_Wolf and DavidKBD.

Explain about this game:

"The game is about keeping the zombies out of life"

- The zombies want to go out the cementery to eat brains and you are the responsible for keeping them in his graves. You are allowed to kill 3 zombies, but if one of them comes out your mission will be failed. 

- We have designed this game thinking that the word Permanence in English would have the same nuances as in Spanish. But we are not sure now hahaha. Btw, we have consulted here and the first example seems to indicate that it does work... (https://dictionary.cambridge.org/es/diccionario/ingles/permanence)
